record.id: field.name="avail.type" and file.name="slamonthly" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: avail.type
record.file.name: slamonthly

brief.brief: The type of measurement used to calculate statistics for the Service Target.

detail.detail: This field will indicate either "uptime" or "duration", depending on whether the SLT is tracking the required time that the configuration item (CI) should be available for any given month, or whether the SLT is tracking the amount of time allowed for a single outage of the CI in any given month.
